availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jesse H. Reno (Muhlenberg Circuit Court clerk and quartermaster, 11th KY Infantry)

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, circuit clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Lewis Reno, Jr., and Sarah Kincheloe Reno. Married to Harriet M. Reno. Father of Jane Reno, Agnes Reno, Jessie Reno, Edward E. Reno. Married to Mary P. Reno. Clerk of the Muhlenberg Circuit Court in Muhlenberg County from 1859 to 1866. Quartermaster of the 11th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) from December 9,1861 to March 17, 1862.
